mapper.insert: insert into t_user (user_id, user_name, user_password, user_image, user_tel) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_password, user_image, user_tel from t_user
